org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.ui.actions

Class OpenNewClassWizardAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Action
      • org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.ui.actions.AbstractOpenWizardAction
        • org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.ui.actions.OpenNewClassWizardAction

  • public class OpenNewClassWizardAction
extends AbstractOpenWizardAction

    Action that opens the new class wizard. The action initialized the wizard with either the selection as configured by #setSelection(org.eclipse.jface.viewers.IStructuredSelection) or takes a preconfigured new class wizard page, see setConfiguredWizardPage(NewClassWizardPage).

    This class may be instantiated; it is not intended to be subclassed.

    Provisional API: This class/interface is part of an interim API that is still under development and expected to change significantly before reaching stability. It is being made available at this early stage to solicit feedback from pioneering adopters on the understanding that any code that uses this API will almost certainly be broken (repeatedly) as the API evolves.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected INewWizard createWizard()
      Creates and configures the wizard.
      void setConfiguredWizardPage(NewClassWizardPage page)
      Sets a page to be used by the wizard or null to use a page initialized with values from the current selection (see AbstractOpenWizardAction.getSelection() and #setSelection(org.eclipse.jface.viewers.IStructuredSelection)).
      void setOpenEditorOnFinish(boolean openEditorOnFinish)
      Specifies if the wizard will open the created type with the default editor.

    • Method Detail

      • setConfiguredWizardPage

        public void setConfiguredWizardPage(NewClassWizardPage page)
        Sets a page to be used by the wizard or null to use a page initialized with values from the current selection (see AbstractOpenWizardAction.getSelection() and #setSelection(org.eclipse.jface.viewers.IStructuredSelection)).
        Parameters:
        page - the page to use or null

      • setOpenEditorOnFinish

        public void setOpenEditorOnFinish(boolean openEditorOnFinish)
        Specifies if the wizard will open the created type with the default editor. The default behaviour is to open an editor.
        Parameters:
        openEditorOnFinish - if set, the wizard will open the created type with the default editor

      • createWizard

        protected final INewWizard createWizard()
                                 throws CoreException
        Description copied from class: AbstractOpenWizardAction
        Creates and configures the wizard. This method should only be called once.
        Specified by:
        createWizard in class AbstractOpenWizardAction
        Returns:
        returns the created wizard.
        Throws:
        CoreException - exception is thrown when the creation was not successful.
